Package chord.instr

Bytecode instrumentation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractInstrumentor Bytecode instrumentor providing hooks for transforming classes, methods, and instructions.
EventKind The kind of an event generated during an instrumented program's execution.
InstrScheme Scheme specifying the kind and format of events to be generated during an instrumented program's execution.
Instrumentor Bytecode instrumentor for instrumenting a variety of common events.
JavassistPool Class pool specifying program classpath for Javassist bytecode instrumentor.
LoadedClassesInstrumentor Bytecode instrumentor for determining all loaded classes.
OfflineTransformer Offline class-file transformer.
OnlineTransformer Online (load-time) class-file transformer.
TracePrinter Functionality for pretty-printing a trace of events generated during an instrumented program's execution.
TraceTransformer Functionality for transforming a trace of events containing BEF_NEW and AFT_NEW events, generated by an instrumented program's execution, into a trace containing NEW events.
 

Package chord.instr Description

Bytecode instrumentation.
